text: Antônio Marcos da Silva FilhoFilho is a suffix to indicate he is the son of Antônio, Snr known as Marquinhos ParanáIn this artist name, Paraná is a suffix to indicate he came from Paraná state or just Marquinhos (little Marcos; born 20 July 1977), is a former Brazilian right-back or defensive midfielder. He last played for Ventforet Kofu in the J.
